sqlMap.select: /* AlgParamDAO.selectList */ SELECT ALG_ID ,PARAM_NM ,PARAM_DEFAULT ,PARAM_VALUE ,PARAM_DESC ,DEL_YN FROM WP2_ALG_PARAM WHERE ALG_ID = #ALG_ID# AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PARAM_NM
sqlMap.update: /* AlgParamDAO.update */ UPDATE WP2_ALG_PARAM SET PARAM_VALUE = #PARAM_VALUE# WHERE ALG_ID = #ALG_ID# AND PARAM_NM = #PARAM_NM#
